identifier.description: A sequence of characters that represents a unique Party.
identifier.title: identifier Schema

registrationAuthority.description: The recognized or statutory body that manages the RegisteredIdentifier.
registrationAuthority.title: registrationAuthority Schema

type.description: A string or enumeration that classifies the RegisteredIdentifier, e.g., VATRegistrationNumber.
type.title: type Schema

validFrom.description: The date (and optionally time) on which the RegisteredIdentifier went into effect.
validFrom.title: validFrom Schema

validTo.description: The date (and optionally time) on which the RegisteredIdentifier expired for a Party. If the expiration date is unknown, validTo should be set to null.
validTo.title: validTo Schema
